subject: Pole Vault
Millrose Games
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Steven Hooker, the first Australian man in decades to win a gold medal in track and field, is one of the few pole-vaulters on the planet who gets stopped on the street every time he goes out.
snippet: Steven Hooker, the first Australian man in decades to win a gold medal in track and field, is one of the few pole-vaulters on the planet who gets stopped on the street every time he goes out.
